name: Pac 3D
description:
Play a game similar to PAC-MAN in a 3D environment:

  • Control the player with arrows keys or WASD
    • Up arrow or W key to go forward
    • Down arrow or S key to go backward
    • Left arrow or A key to rotate left
    • Right arrow or D key to rotate right
  • Collect all the pellets in the maze
    • Eat a pellet in order to collect it and increase the score
    • The level is won once all pellets are collected
  • Watch out for ghosts
    • Each ghost has different behaviors
    • The player loses a life when they touch a ghost
  • Defeat ghost using super pellets
    • Eat a super pellet to put ghosts in an eatable state
    • Once eaten, ghosts cannot hurt the player for a while 

Note: The web page must be refreshed to restart the game
